frontmatter.title: Invoke AWS Lambda from AWS Step Functions with Terraform
From CSV to Google Sheet Using Python
frontmatter.description: Upload a CSV file to Google Spread Sheet using python. In this article we have used a Python library gspread. gspread is a Python API for Google Sheets.

frontmatter.title: Structure Your Project with Flask Blueprint
frontmatter.description: Blueprint is a way to organize related code in the same module. Blueprint allows us to simplify complex project by dividing it in smaller modules.

frontmatter.title: Flask with SQLAlchemy & Marshmallow
frontmatter.description: In the article we will build a simple REST API using Flask, SQLAlchemy and Marshmallow. We will be building a note taking application where these two API endpoints /note/ and /note/<id>/ will be available.

frontmatter.title: Oracle PL/SQL Conditions
frontmatter.description: Controlling the flow of execution is common in programming. It is very much needed to direct the flow of program based on some conditions. This can be done in any programming language by IF statements.
